attributes.action: Create a new bank holiday dedicated to NHS staff.
attributes.additional_details: The country owes a debt to all NHS staff. This has always been true but now more than ever. The crisis has demonstrated that for many work holds a lower priority than once thought, and we should remember those whose roles we take for granted but are essential to our way of life.
attributes.background: Once the country has beaten COVID-19, we should create a new Bank Holiday to thank those that have put their health and lives on the line for us. This should be in addition to the current bank holidays and held every year, to remember their sacrifice and the national effort.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
